description: Built and maintained backend services and internal integrations that handle data ingestion, processing, and communication across the platform & reduced processing delays up to 25%.
Designed event-driven pipelines using webhooks/streams that enabled real-time handling of alerts and updates, cutting end-to-end processing time from minutes to seconds.
Optimized the SaaS platform UI to visualize system vulnerabilities, improving data accessibility.
Enhanced website performance by 30% through efficient API development and played a key role in creating a more intuitive and visually appealing user interface (UI).
Provisioned an EC2 instance, configured it with NGINX and deployed both the frontend and backend of a website and used Route 53 to assign a custom domain to the server.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines that significantly reduced deployment time, enabling faster and more efficient releases.
Implemented and enhanced dialog flow system to improve Intent Recognition by 26%.
Led efforts to optimize and refine the Intent Recognition capabilities of the virtual assistant.
Developed and implemented strategies to enhance user interaction by improving the accuracy of Intent Recognition.
Contributed to full-stack development tasks using React.js and Node.js.
Collaborated with the team to implement new features and fix bugs.
Gained hands-on experience with Git version control and reactive programming paradigms.
Responsible for building quality & efficient backend code for MongoDB databases in Node.js for software applications.
Accountable for creating good-looking & user-friendly websites with frontend development skills in React.js.
Built full-fledged websites with features like authentication, dynamic databases, etc.
Gained experience building industry-level software and assembling them using industry standards.
